jd: From: rajkumar, NITYA Software Solutions Inc. rajkumar.v@nityainc.com Reply to: rajkumar.v@nityainc.com Hi,I hope you are doing well.I am Raj from NITYA Software Solutions Inc.I've included below the job description, please let me know if you are interested, and reply with one updated resume, which I've expected.Role: GCP Data Migration EngineerBachelor degree in Computer Science, Mathematics or a related technical field or equivalent practical experienceExperience with Relational Databases, Big Data technologies : Spark, HadoopExperience in Managing large scale Windows/Linux environmentsExperience in Identity and Access Management, networking, storage and compute infrastructureExperience in architecting and developing software or infrastructure for scalable and secure distributed systemsExperience automating infrastructure provisioning, DevOps, and/or continuous integration/deliveryUnderstanding of open source server softwareCustomer facing migration experience, including service discovery, assessment, planning, execution, and operationsDemonstrated excellent communication, presentation, and problem-solving skillsExperience in project governance and enterprise customer managementThank you,RajkumarEMAIL ID:rajkumar.v@nityainc.comNITYA Software Solutions Inc.
